channel.title: Help, (dying and losing items) [508]
channel.description:
Hello everyone, many will think this is a "stupid" question, even though it may be I need some help. I'm working on a 508 server, and I would like to know how to make people lose their items on death. Obviously the source creator, my source is "Mithscape V1", made it so that there were PvP drops.
My question mainly is how do I change back the drops and make players lose there items? If somebody could post a link to a tutorial or thoroughly explain it for me I'd be very grateful! thank you :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 25, 2009, 07:06:44 pm[/size][hr].

item.title: Help, (dying and losing items) [508]
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

Hello everyone, many will think this is a “stupid” question, even though it may be I need some help.
I’m working on a 508 server, and I would like to know how to make people lose their items on death.
Obviously the source creator, my source is “Mithscape V1”, made it so that there were PvP drops.

My question mainly is how do I change back the drops and make players lose there items?
If somebody could post a link to a tutorial or thoroughly explain it for me I’d be very grateful!
thank you :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 25, 2009, 07:06:44 pm[/size][hr].
